About.system_description: The ASIST testbed provides an environment for research into human/AI teams.
About.darpa_acknolwedgement: The ASIST project is sponsored by DARPA

asi_cmu_ta1_atlas.up: echo 'Bringing up the CMU TA1 Atlas Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/cmu_ta1_intervention_agent/docker compose.yml --env-file ./Agents/cmu_ta1_intervention_agent/settings.env up -d
asi_cmu_ta1_atlas.down: echo 'Bringing down the CMU TA1 Atlas Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/cmu_ta1_intervention_agent/docker compose.yml down -d

atomic_agent.up: echo 'Bringing up the Atomic Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/atomic_agent/docker compose.yml --env-file ./Agents/atomic_agent/settings.env up -d
atomic_agent.down: echo 'Bringing down the Atomic Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/atomic_agent/docker compose.yml down -d

cra_psicoach_agent.up: echo 'Bringing up the CRA PSI-Coach Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/PsiCoachAgent/docker compose.yml up -d
cra_psicoach_agent.down: echo 'Bringing down the CRA PSI-Coach Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/PsiCoachAgent/docker compose.yml down -d

rita_agent.up: echo 'Bringing up the Rita Agent' && echo '$PWD: Starting Rita Agent' && dte=$(date '+%B-%Y-%d--%H') && log_dir='logs-${dte}' && export SERVICE_LOGS_DIR='$PWD/$log_dir/' &&  echo '${SERVICE_LOGS_DIR} Log dirs for this instantiation of Rita' && docker compose -f ./Agents/Rita_Agent/docker compose.yml up -d
rita_agent.down: echo 'Bringing down the Rita Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/Rita_Agent/docker compose.yml down -d

sift_asistant.up: echo 'Bringing up the SIFT Asistant Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/SIFT_Asistant_Agent/docker compose.yml up -d
sift_asistant.down: echo 'Bringing down the SIFT Asistant Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/SIFT_Asistant_Agent/docker compose.yml down -d

tomcat.up: echo 'Bringing up the UAZ Tomcat (TMM) Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/uaz_tmm_agent/docker compose.yml up -d
tomcat.down: echo 'Bringing down the UAZ Tomcat (TMM) Agent' && docker-compose -f ./Agents/uaz_tmm_agent/docker compose.yml down -d
